summary: Dragonborn Armors fitted to the CBBE Body
descriptionHtml:
Description
=========================================================================================
This mod makes the Dragonborn armors fitting the CBBE body.
The vanilla armors will be replaced!


Requirements
=========================================================================================
Dragonborn DLC
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition v3.2.3[/url] recommended
Skyrim v1.8


Installation
=========================================================================================
Use the NMM Installer or copy all files from the rar-archive to your Skyrim Data Folder (...\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\).


Known Bugs
=========================================================================================
-> Nordic Carved, Skaal and Temple armor have no weight slider. This is a vanilla bug.
-> Miraak buggy

Thanks for your feedback!


Next update
=========================================================================================
-> Bodyslide support
-> fixed Miraak bug
-> Deathbrand, Morag Tong, Blackguard, Ahzidal added


Changelog
=========================================================================================
v1.2
Curvy body:
-> Bonemold mesh issues fixed
-> Skaal optimized
Slim body:
-> Cloth armors now included

v1.1
Curvy body:
-> Cloth armors added
-> Stahlrim light optimized


FAQ
=========================================================================================
Q: Will you make a slim version?
A: Yes, just give me some more time.

Q: I found some Bugs. What should I do?
A: Write your problems in the comments section or send me a PM. Sometimes some Screens would be nice to see the issue.


Credit
=========================================================================================
Thanks to..

Bethesda for developing Skyrim
author: Frigus
